channel.title: How to make a normal staff ancient?
channel.description:
Hai,
I was just wondering how I can change a staff from Normal, to Ancient, so it can cast ancient magics.
I have searched for over 2 hours now, and haven't found anything at all.
Pretty much what my problem is, is this: I have a Zuriel Staff that casts Normal Magics. It says "You cannot cast ancient magic spells with a regular staff!" I want to make it so I can cast ancient magics.
Thanks in advance, Ace.

item.title: How to make a normal staff ancient?
